content.name: name
content.description: Ship's name.

content.name: call
content.description: Call sign or WMO Number. Some sea stations are identified by a WMO Number instead of a call sign.

content.name: IMOn
content.description: IMO Number. Unique identifying number assigned by Lloyd's Register to the hull of the ship.

content.name: rcnty
content.description: Recruiting country.

content.name: vssl
content.description: Vessel type.

content.name: vsslP
content.description: Vessel digital image.

content.name: lenvsslD
content.description: Length overall of the ship, ignoring bulbous bow.

content.name: brdvsslD
content.description: Moulded breadth. The greatest breadth amidships.

content.name: frbvsslD
content.description: Freeboard. The average height of the upper deck above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: drfvsslD
content.description: Draught. The average depth of the keel below the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: chtvsslD
content.description: Cargo height. Maximum height above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: brdg
content.description: Distance of the bridge from the bow.

content.name: vsslM
content.description: Type of meteorological reporting ship.

content.name: atm
content.description: General observing practice.

content.name: blc
content.description: Baseline check of the automatic weather station.

content.name: rte1
content.description: Route No.1.

content.name: rte2
content.description: Route No.2.

content.name: rte3
content.description: Route No.3.

content.name: rte4
content.description: Route No.4.

content.name: rte5
content.description: Route No.5.

content.name: rte6
content.description: Route No.6.

content.name: rte7
content.description: Route No.7

content.name: rte8
content.description: Route No.8.

content.name: rte9
content.description: Route No.9.

content.name: rte10
content.description: Route No.10.

content.name: barm1
content.description: Primary barometer type.

content.name: barm2
content.description: Secondary barometer type.

content.name: bMS1
content.description: Make and model of the primary barometer.

content.name: bMS2
content.description: Make and model of the secondary barometer.

content.name: brmH1
content.description: Height of the primary barometer above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: brmH2
content.description: Height of the secondary barometer above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: brmL1
content.description: Location of the primary barometer.

content.name: brmL2
content.description: Location of the secondary barometer.

content.name: brmU1
content.description: Pressure units of the primary barometer.

content.name: brmU2
content.description: Pressure units of the secondary barometer.

content.name: brmC1
content.description: Most recent calibration date of the primary barometer.

content.name: brmC2
content.description: Most recent calibration date of the secondary barometer.

content.name: thrm1
content.description: Dry bulb thermometer type No.1.

content.name: thrm2
content.description: Dry bulb thermometer type No.2.

content.name: thMS1
content.description: Make and model of the dry bulb thermometer No.1.

content.name: thMS2
content.description: Make and model of the dry bulb thermometer No.2.

content.name: thmE1
content.description: Exposure of the dry bulb thermometer No.1.

content.name: thmE2
content.description: Exposure of the dry bulb thermometer No.2.

content.name: thmL1
content.description: Location of dry bulb thermometer No.1 and hgyrometer No.1.

content.name: thmL2
content.description: Location of dry bulb thermometer No.2 and hgyrometer No.2.

content.name: thmH1
content.description: Height of the dry bulb thermometer No.1 and hygrometer No.1 above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: thmH2
content.description: Height of the dry bulb thermometer No.2 and hygrometer No.2 above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: tscale1
content.description: General reporting practice for dry bulb thermometer No.1 and hygrometer No.1.

content.name: tscale2
content.description: General reporting practice for dry bulb thermometer No.2 and hygrometer No.2.

content.name: hygr1
content.description: Hygrometer type No.1.

content.name: hygr2
content.description: Hygrometer type No.2.

content.name: hgrE1
content.description: Exposure of the hygrometer No.1.

content.name: hgrE2
content.description: Exposure of the hygrometer No.2.

content.name: sstM1
content.description: Primary method of obtaining the sea surface temperature.

content.name: sstM2
content.description: Secondary method of obtaining the sea surface temperature.

content.name: sstD1
content.description: Depth of the primary sea surface temperature observation below the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: sstD2
content.description: Depth of the secondary sea surface temperature observation below the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: barg1
content.description: Primary barograph type, or method of determining pressure tendency.

content.name: barg2
content.description: Secondary barograph type, or method of determining pressure tendency.

content.name: anHL1
content.description: Height of the primary (fixed) anemometer above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: anHL2
content.description: Height of the secondary (fixed) anemometer above the maximum Summer load line.

content.name: anHD1
content.description: Height of the primary (fixed) anemometer above the deck on which it is installed.

content.name: anHD2
content.description: Height of the secondary (fixed) anemometer above the deck on which it is installed.

content.name: anmL1
content.description: Location of the primary anemometer.

content.name: anmL2
content.description: Location of the secondary anemometer.

content.name: anDB1
content.description: Distance of the primary (fixed) anemometer from the bow.

content.name: anDB2
content.description: Distance of the secondary (fixed) anemometer from the bow.

content.name: anDC1
content.description: Distance of the primary (fixed) anemometer from the centre line.

content.name: anDC2
content.description: Distance of the secondary (fixed) anemometer from the centre line.

content.name: anmM1
content.description: Primary anemometer - instrument type (manufacturer/ series no./ etc.).

content.name: anmM2
content.description: Secondary anemometer - Instrument type (manufacturer/ series no./ etc.).

content.name: anmU
content.description: General wind observing practice.

content.name: anmC1
content.description: Most recent calibration date of the primary anemometer.

content.name: anmC2
content.description: Most recent calibration date of the secondary anemometer.

content.name: wwH
content.description: Visual wind/wave observing height.
